verses.verse: וְהַנָּחָשׁ֙ <S%H5175><s%> Now the serpent הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> was עָר֔וּם <S%H6175><s%> more subtil מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> any חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> than any beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had made יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> Yea כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> hath God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall not eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> any עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> of every tree הַגָּֽן׃ <S%H1588><s%> garden

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> unto the serpent מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> of the trees הַגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> of the garden נֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> We may eat

וּמִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> But of the fruit הָעֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> which [is] in the midst הַגָּן֒ <S%H1588><s%> of the garden אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> hath said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall not eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תִגְּע֖וּ <S%H5060><s%> of it neither shall ye touch בּ֑וֹ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> it lest תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <S%H4191><s%> ye die

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> And the serpent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מ֖וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Ye shall not surely תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <S%H4191><s%> die

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for יֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> doth know אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> For God כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> that in the day אֲכָלְכֶ֣ם <S%H398><s%> ye eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְנִפְקְח֖וּ <S%H6491><s%> shall be opened עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> thereof then your eyes וִהְיִיתֶם֙ <S%H1961><s%> will be like כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and ye shall be as gods יֹדְעֵ֖י <S%H3045><s%> knowing ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> and evil

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָֽאִשָּׁ֡ה <S%H802><s%> And when the woman כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for טוֹב֩ <S%H2896><s%> [was] good הָעֵ֨ץ <S%H6086><s%> that the tree לְמַאֲכָ֜ל <S%H3978><s%> for food וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for תַֽאֲוָה־ <S%H8378><s%> [was] pleasant ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and that it לָעֵינַ֗יִם <S%H5869><s%> to the eyes וְנֶחְמָ֤ד <S%H2530><s%> to be desired הָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> and a tree לְהַשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> to make [one] wise וַתִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> she took מִפִּרְי֖וֹ <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit thereof וַתֹּאכַ֑ל <S%H398><s%> and did eat וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> and gave גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְאִישָׁ֛הּ <S%H582><s%> another עִמָּ֖הּ <S%H5973><s%> her and he וַיֹּאכַֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> with her and he did eat

וַתִּפָּקַ֙חְנָה֙ <S%H6491><s%> were opened עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> And the eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> of them both וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵֽירֻמִּ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> that they [were] naked הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> and they וַֽיִּתְפְּרוּ֙ <S%H8609><s%> together עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5929><s%> leaves תְאֵנָ֔ה <S%H8384><s%> fig וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and made themselves לָהֶ֖ם חֲגֹרֹֽת׃ <S%H2290><s%> aprons

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> And they heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God מִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walking בַּגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> in the garden לְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> in the cool הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day וַיִּתְחַבֵּ֨א <S%H2244><s%> hid themselves הָֽאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> and Adam וְאִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> amongst עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> the trees הַגָּֽן׃ <S%H1588><s%> of the garden

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> unto Adam וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֖וֹ אַיֶּֽכָּה׃ <S%H335><s%> Where

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹלְךָ֥ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I heard בַּגָּ֑ן <S%H1588><s%> in the garden וָאִירָ֛א <S%H3372><s%> and I was afraid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עֵירֹ֥ם <S%H5903><s%> [was] naked אָנֹ֖כִי <S%H595><s%> because I וָאֵחָבֵֽא׃ <S%H2244><s%> and I hid myself

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> Who הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> told לְךָ֔ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵירֹ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> naked אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you הֲמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> of which צִוִּיתִ֛יךָ <S%H6680><s%> whereof I commanded thee לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> that thou shouldest not אֲכָל־ <S%H398><s%> eat מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אָכָֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H398><s%> burn up

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> And the man הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> The woman אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> whom thou gavest עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> [to be] with me הִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> she נָֽתְנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> gave לִּ֥י מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> me of the tree וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and I did eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God לָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> unto the woman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> hast עָשִׂ֑ית <S%H6213><s%> What [is] this [that] thou hast done וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> And the woman הַנָּחָ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> The serpent הִשִּׁיאַ֖נִי <S%H5377><s%> beguiled me וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and I did eat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said יְהֹוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנָּחָשׁ֮ <S%H5175><s%> unto the serpent כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> hast done זֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> likewise אָר֤וּר <S%H779><s%> this thou [art] cursed אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> Because thou מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> above all cattle וּמִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and above every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on גְּחֹנְךָ֣ <S%H1512><s%> upon thy belly תֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go וְעָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> and dust תֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

וְאֵיבָ֣ה ׀ <S%H342><s%> enmity אָשִׁ֗ית <S%H7896><s%> And I will put בֵּֽינְךָ֙ <S%H996><s%> Between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> and between הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> between thee and the woman וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> Between זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> and between thy seed וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> Between זַרְעָ֑הּ <S%H2233><s%> and her seed ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יְשׁוּפְךָ֣ <S%H7779><s%> it shall bruise רֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> thy head וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> and you תְּשׁוּפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7779><s%> and thou shalt bruise עָקֵֽב׃ <S%H6119><s%> his heel ס

אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> Unto the woman אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> he said הַרְבָּ֤ה <S%H7235><s%> I will greatly אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> multiply עִצְּבוֹנֵ֣ךְ <S%H6093><s%> thy sorrow וְהֵֽרֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H2032><s%> and thy conception בְּעֶ֖צֶב <S%H6089><s%> in sorrow תֵּֽלְדִ֣י <S%H3205><s%> thou shalt bring forth בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> children וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> will be for אִישֵׁךְ֙ <S%H376><s%> [shall be] to thy husband תְּשׁ֣וּקָתֵ֔ךְ <S%H8669><s%> and thy desire וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יִמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> and he shall rule בָּֽךְ׃ ס

וּלְאָדָ֣ם <S%H121><s%> And unto Adam אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> he said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because שָׁמַעְתָּ֮ <S%H8085><s%> Because thou hast hearkened לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice אִשְׁתֶּךָ֒ <S%H802><s%> of thy wife וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and hast eaten מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the tree אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> of which צִוִּיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> I commanded thee לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt not eat מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at אֲרוּרָ֤ה <S%H779><s%> of it cursed הָֽאֲדָמָה֙ <S%H127><s%> [is] the ground בַּֽעֲבוּרֶ֔ךָ <S%H5668><s%> because בְּעִצָּבוֹן֙ <S%H6093><s%> for thy sake in sorrow תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֔נָּה <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> [of] it all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

וְק֥וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> Thorns also וְדַרְדַּ֖ר <S%H1863><s%> and thistles תַּצְמִ֣יחַֽ <S%H6779><s%> shall it bring forth לָ֑ךְ וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> to thee and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> the herb הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

בְּזֵעַ֤ת <S%H2188><s%> In the sweat אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> of thy face תֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> till שֽׁוּבְךָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> thou return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> unto the ground כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at לֻקָּ֑חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> for out of it wast thou taken כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> for dust אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> thou וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> [art] and unto dust תָּשֽׁוּב׃ <S%H7725><s%> shalt thou return

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> called הָֽאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> And Adam שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife's חַוָּ֑ה <S%H2332><s%> Eve כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> he הָֽיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> because she was the mother כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> of all living

וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <S%H6213><s%> make יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> did the LORD אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> God לְאָדָ֧ם <S%H120><s%> Unto Adam וּלְאִשְׁתּ֛וֹ <S%H802><s%> also and to his wife כָּתְנ֥וֹת <S%H3801><s%> coats ע֖וֹר <S%H5785><s%> of skins וַיַּלְבִּשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H3847><s%> and clothed them פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God הֵ֤ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> the man הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> has become כְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> is become as one מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of Us לָדַ֖עַת <S%H3045><s%> of us to know ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> and evil וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> and now פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> might יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> and now lest he put forth יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְלָקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> and take גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also מֵעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> also of the tree הַֽחַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> of life וְאָכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> and eat וָחַ֥י <S%H2425><s%> and live לְעֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֛הוּ <S%H7971><s%> sent him forth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God מִגַּן־ <S%H1588><s%> from the garden עֵ֑דֶן <S%H5731><s%> of Eden לַֽעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> to till אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the ground אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֻקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> from whence he was taken מִשָּֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it
